mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.applicant AS "applicant", a.ident AS "ident", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.relevant_person AS "relevantPerson", a.description AS "description", a.file AS "file", a.status AS "status", a.reviewer AS "reviewer", a.content AS "content", a.reply_file AS "replyFile", a.extend1 AS "extend1", a.extend2 AS "extend2", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", (case a.type when 01 then '上访申请' when 02 then '司法调解申请' when 03 then '在线问题投诉' else '' end) "typeLable", (case a.status when 01 then '待审核' when 02 then '未通过' when 03 then '已通过' else '' end) "statusLable"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id=a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_office o on o.id=u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_service_online( id, type, applicant, ident, telephone, relevant_person, description, file, status, reviewer, content, reply_file, extend1, extend2, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{applicant}, #{ident}, #{telephone}, #{relevantPerson}, #{description}, #{file}, #{status}, #{reviewer}, #{content}, #{replyFile}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_service_online SET type = #{type}, applicant = #{applicant}, ident = #{ident}, telephone = #{telephone}, relevant_person = #{relevantPerson}, description = #{description}, file = #{file}, status = #{status}, reviewer = #{reviewer}, content = #{content}, reply_file = #{replyFile}, extend1 = #{extend1}, extend2 = #{extend2}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.type AS "typeO", b.label AS "type", COUNT(*) AS "value" FROM ccm_service_online a LEFT JOIN sys_dict b ON b.type = "ccm_service_online_type" AND a.type = b.VALUE WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.type IS NOT NULL AND a.type != "" AND ( a.create_date > date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) AND a.create_date < date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ) GROUP BY typeO

SELECT a.status AS "typeO", b.label AS "type", COUNT(*) AS "value" FROM ccm_service_online a LEFT JOIN sys_dict b ON b.type = "ccm_service_online_handle" AND a.status = b.VALUE WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.status IS NOT NULL AND a.status != "" AND ( a.create_date > date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) AND a.create_date < date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ) GROUP BY typeO
